articles.title: The unlocked Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 5G and Galaxy Z Fold 2 5G are more affordable than ever - PhoneArena
articles.description: Perhaps affordable is a bit of a stretch, but following the latest round of Amazon discounts, the Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 5G and Galaxy Z Fold 2 5G are less expensive than ever before.

articles.title: iOS 14 has already been jailbroken - Gizchina.com
articles.description: iOS 14 has already been jailbroken. The vulnerability can be used to jailbreak all devices with Apple A12 SoC and newer.
articles.content:
Digital Security Specialist @pattern_F_ confirmed that he successfully bypassed the security system of the iOS 14 operating system by demonstrating a working jailbreak on his iPhone 11 smartphone.
